ygData.subject: RE: Leatherfoot Raider Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: The Leatherfoot raider cap, at least the quest one, not sure about the one you get by killing halflings, has the leather graphic. Kitasi Hobbit-friend ...
ygData.messageBody:
The Leatherfoot raider cap, at least the quest one, not sure about the one
you get by killing halflings, has the leather graphic.

Kitasi Hobbit-friend

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, September 08, 1999 1:49 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Leatherfoot Raider Cap


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

does that have a leather graphic to it or no graphic?


> From: Richard Ashkettle <richard_ashkettle@...>
>


> Then it hit me. "Please bring it here...I CAN use
> it". I went to Rivervale, sprinted up the stairs, and
> handed my Dirk to the Marshall. He give me 3 gold,
> some pittance of exp and a nice SHINY NEW Leatherfoot
> Raider cap. At AC4, its less than the AC of my Banded
> helm (I HATE the Wood Elf Bronze one), but that +10
> CHARISMA is NIIIIIICE. By the time I got downstairs,
> he was waiting with a new Dirk for me.
